title: NO FEE 2 bed split somerville with ev charging and kid friendly
posting_body: 2 identical apartments are available in the same building.
located in Somerville, near the beautiful bike pass leads directly to Davis square.
The soon-to-be-open Magoun square station is just 2 minutes away!
Brand new everything inside, in-unit laundry, central ac, parking included.
EV charging on the exterior of the building, allows the resident to charge their EV or large battery bank at the residential electric rate by eversource!
The apartment also has lead compliance, suitable for young children.
Closest and also zoned elementary school is John F.
no broker fee, rent directly from the owner!
